author: Staff Reporter
text:
Police arrested a 27-year-old youth on charges of stealing motorcycles at Marina Beach on Monday.

Azharuddin, Anna Square police said, was arrested by a crime team that was investigating cases of motorcycle theft on the beach.

During interrogation, Azharuddin confessed to his crimes. The team recovered a total of 15 motorcycles from him, police added.
title: 27-year-old arrested for bike theft
